branchNameLinter.msgBranchBanned: Branches with the name "%s" are not allowed.
branchNameLinter.msgBranchDisallowed: Pushing to "%s" is not allowed, use git-flow.
branchNameLinter.msgPrefixNotAllowed: Branch prefix "%s" is not allowed (try breaking, feature, fix, refactor, ci, dependabot, test, docs).
